verses.text: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,

lest \w they|strong="H3068"\w* tear apart \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion, ripping \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* pieces, while \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*.

\w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H5337"\w* God, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5337"\w* done this, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* there \w is|strong="H5315"\w* iniquity \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* hands,

\w if|strong="H3426"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* rewarded \w evil|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* (yes, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* plundered \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w without|strong="H6213"\w* \w cause|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* adversary),

let \w the|strong="H7999"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* pursue \w my|strong="H7999"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H7451"\w* overtake \w it|strong="H7999"\w*; yes, let \w him|strong="H1580"\w* tread \w my|strong="H7999"\w* life down \w to|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H7451"\w* lay \w my|strong="H7999"\w* glory \w in|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* dust. \qs Selah.\qs*

Arise, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w your|strong="H7291"\w* anger. Lift \w up|strong="H7931"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w* against \w the|strong="H7291"\w* rage \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H7291"\w* adversaries. Awake \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*. \w You|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H7429"\w* commanded judgement.

Let \w the|strong="H5375"\w* congregation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* peoples surround \w you|strong="H6680"\w*. \w Rule|strong="H4941"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* administers judgement \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*. Judge \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* integrity \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H4791"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

Oh let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* end, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* establish \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w*; \w their|strong="H3068"\w* minds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w are|strong="H5971"\w* searched \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3559"\w* shield \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w with|strong="H6662"\w* God, \w who|strong="H6662"\w* saves \w the|strong="H3559"\w* upright \w in|strong="H3559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*.
God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* judge, yes, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w who|strong="H3477"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* indignation every day.

If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* doesn’t repent, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* sharpen \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sword; \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* bent \w and|strong="H3117"\w* strung \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bow.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H2719"\w* also \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H2719"\w* death. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w makes|strong="H3559"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* flaming \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w*.

Behold,\f + \fr 7:14 \ft “Behold”, from “\+wh הִנֵּה\+wh*”, means look at, take notice, observe, see, or gaze at. It is often used as an interjection.\f* \w he|strong="H4194"\w* travails \w with|strong="H3627"\w* iniquity. Yes, \w he|strong="H4194"\w* \w has|strong="H4194"\w* conceived mischief, \w and|strong="H3627"\w* brought \w out|strong="H3559"\w* falsehood.

\w He|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* dug \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hole, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* fallen into \w the|strong="H3205"\w* pit which \w he|strong="H2009"\w* made.

\w The|strong="H5307"\w* trouble he causes \w shall|strong="H7845"\w* return \w to|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* own \w head|strong="H5307"\w*. \w His|strong="H6466"\w* violence \w shall|strong="H7845"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* crown \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* own \w head|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* sing praise \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* Most \w High|strong="H7218"\w*.
